description.p: Provides the jpackage repository. Using this it's possible to install packages from the jpackage project.

jpackage provides a large set of java packages which can be used together with the Fedora ones. We focus on free and open source software whenever possible. For convenience, we also provide non-free packages without the restricted source code.

The package uses system-config-repo to provide a graphical interface to the file in /etc/yum.repos.d. Using the GUI user can inspect and modify whether the repository is enabled, signed, etc. It's also possible to view the underlying file.
